item.title: CRDT · RxDB - Documentation
item.description: Whenever there are multiple instances in a distributed system, data writes can cause conflicts. Two different clients could do a write to the same document at the same time or while they are both offline. When the clients replicate the document state with the server, a conflict emerges that must be resolved by the system.
